summary: This is an email quarantine digest notification sent to Audrey Strauss on August 24, 2020, showing a quarantined email with subject "Epstein's 2020- Release Buddy 08-23 andw Nol Clinton 15:00:21" that appears to reference Epstein and Clinton.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Recipient of the email quarantine digest notification from the system administrator.

persons.name: Chris Hepburn
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the quarantined email (from chris@chrishepbum.org domain) with subject referencing Epstein and Clinton.

events.title: Email about Epstein and Clinton
events.description: An email with subject referencing Epstein and Clinton was sent and subsequently quarantined by the email system.

keyFacts: The document is an email quarantine digest notification dated August 24, 2020, sent to Audrey Strauss.
A quarantined email from Chris Hepburn (chris@chrishepbum.org) has the subject "Epstein's 2020- Release Buddy 08-23 andw Nol Clinton 15:00:21".
The email system flagged this message as spam with a score of 100, indicating high confidence it was unwanted content.
The subject line suggests some connection or reference between Epstein and Clinton, though the full content is not shown.
Audrey Strauss was the Acting U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York at this time, overseeing Epstein-related matters.
